title: Vuelta a España ticker: UAE Team Emirates backs two-leader strategy in podium push, Mas returns for Movistar, Jumbo-Visma ‘ready for anything’
content:
Follow all the pre-race news ahead of the opening Barcelona team time trial on Saturday 26.
